reviewtext: This is exactly as I expected and as described. Simple to install. Sturdy "module" attachment via included Super Glue.  Cable is long enough for three items.  I ran mine through a large eye-screw in the wall to keep the systems from going anyplace.I suppose this item might deserve 5-stars - but, by necessity and function, it's not every attractive. Not really Kensington's fault on that.  But something ingenious would earn a 5th star :)
summary: Exactly as described and it works well
